title: Easter Date Calculation
description: This function calculates the date of Easter Sunday for a given year using algorithms to determine the date based on the Gregorian calendar. It should return a DATE type that represents Easter Sunday for the specified year.
name: EASTER

input.name: year
input.description: The year for which the Easter date should be calculated, provided as an integer.

output.name: EASTER
output.description: The calculated date of Easter Sunday for the specified year.

return_value.description: The calculated date of Easter Sunday for the year input.
